item.title: Optimum: Hack The Box Walkthrough
item.description: This post documents the complete walkthrough of Optimum, a retired vulnerable VM created by ch4p, and hosted at Hack The Box. If you are uncomfortable with spoilers, please stop reading now. Background Optimum is a retired vulnerable VM from Hack The Box. Information Gathering Let’s start with masscan to enumerate the open ports in this host. masscan -e tun0 -p0-65535,U:0-65535 10.10.10.8 --rate=1000 Starting masscan 1.0.6 (http://bit.ly/14GZzcT) at 2019-06-18 15:36:07 GMT -- forced options: -sS -Pn -n --randomize-hosts -v --send-eth Initiating SYN Stealth Scan Scanning 1 hosts [131072 ports/host] Discovered open port 80/tcp on 10.

item.title: Samuel Adi
item.description: A Information Security enthusiast who likes dogs and to magically break things. On a journey to get OSCP Certification.
